rules.title: You will receive a body.
rules.description: You may love it or hate it, but it will be yours for the duration of your life on Earth.

rules.title: You will learn lessons.
rules.description: You are enrolled in a full-time informal school called 'life.' Each day in this school you will have the opportunity to learn lessons. You may like the lessons or hate them, but you have designed them as part of your curriculum.

rules.title: There are no mistakes, only lessons.
rules.description: Growth is a process of experimentation, a series of trials, errors, and occasional victories. The failed experiments are as much a part of the process as the experiments that work.
